commit-message: [UIMA-2523] restructuring folders so uimafit has own trunk git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/uima/sandbox/trunk/uimaFIT/trunk@1421430 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
[UIMA-2523] update modules to use lower case git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/uima/sandbox/uimafit/trunk@1422153 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[UIMA-2553] Maven plugin to generate component descriptors from uimaFIT annotations at build time - Write descriptors to ${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/uimafit (configurable) - Ignore unresolved dependencies (probably those out of scope, e.g. in "test" scope) - Add m2e life cycle mapping git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/uima/sandbox/uimafit/trunk@1438268 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[UIMA-2599] Fill description of component and parameters from JavaDoc - uimafit-maven-plugin: Workaround for MNG-5346 to fix build - uimafit-maven-plugin: Added "enhance" mojo - uimafit-maven-plugin: Refactoring to extract common code from "generate" and "enhance" mojo - uimafit: moved some default values to Defaults.java. The Maven plugin can use this to check if a field has a default value or a customized value. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/uima/sandbox/uimafit/trunk@1439070 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

[UIMA-2102] Make ResourceManager_impl.ResourceRegistration protected - Upgrade uimaFIT to uimaj-core 2.4.1-SNAPSHOT - Hack to create ResourceRegistration instances no longer necessary git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/uima/sandbox/uimafit/trunk@1477936 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
